metadata.name: The story of Adam and Eve.Part of one
metadata.description: Part 1: God created man from soil and created for him a wife from his own kind. God said to the angels: I created Adam superior to you, you must prostrate before him. All the angels prostrated before Adam except Iblis who was of fire. Iblis said I am I am superior to Adam and I will never prostrate. God threw Iblis out.Iblis said to God, "I will always try to deceive your servants and take them away from you. God brought Adam and Eve into a garden of paradise and said to them: You can eat everything that is edible and drinkable, except the fruit of the forbidden tree. Adam and Eve are in a garden of paradise. They were happy and everything was available to them until....Description:(In the first part, I have shown that Adam and Eve were created from soil and are naked. Iblis is made of fire and we see a special tree next to Iblis that looks burnt. I have placed a beautiful river with flowers and fish between Adam and Eve and the angels, which represents It is peace.)
